changeSet.author: Saeb
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TBL_MATERIAL (ID, C_CREATED_BY, D_CREATED_DATE, C_LAST_MODIFIED_BY, D_LAST_MODIFIED_DATE, N_VERSION, N_E_STATUS, B_EDITABLE, C_ABBREVIATION, C_CODE, C_DESCL, C_DESCP, UNIT_ID) VALUES (-1, 'liquibase', current_timestamp, null, null, 0, 1, 1, '-1', '-1', 'آیتمهای ارسالی از لجستیک', 'تعیین نشده', -1);

changeSet.author: Saeb
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TBL_MATERIAL (ID, C_CREATED_BY, D_CREATED_DATE, N_VERSION, N_E_STATUS, B_EDITABLE, C_ABBREVIATION, C_CODE, C_DESCL, C_DESCP, UNIT_ID) VALUES (2, 'liquibase', current_timestamp, 2, 1, 0, 'CAD', '74031100', 'Copper Cathode', 'مس کاتد', -1); INSERT /*+ ignore_row_on_dupkey_index(TBL_MATERIAL, TBL_MATERIALPK) */ INTO TBL_MATERIAL (ID, C_CREATED_BY, D_CREATED_DATE, N_VERSION, N_E_STATUS, B_EDITABLE, C_ABBREVIATION, C_CODE, C_DESCL, C_DESCP, UNIT_ID) VALUES (3, 'liquibase', current_timestamp, 6, 1, 0, 'CONC', '26030090', 'Copper Concentrate', 'مس کنسانتره', -1); INSERT INTO TBL_MATERIAL (ID, C_CREATED_BY, D_CREATED_DATE, N_VERSION, N_E_STATUS, B_EDITABLE, C_ABBREVIATION, C_CODE, C_DESCL, C_DESCP, UNIT_ID) VALUES (1, 'liquibase', current_timestamp, 3, 1, 0, 'MO', '28257000', 'Molybdenum Oxide', 'اکسید مولیبدن', -1);
